animeQuotes.quote: What are you so hesitant about? It’s your dream, isn’t it? It’s right in front of you, and you’re wavering? You gotta be reckless and take whatever you can!
If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
Push through the pain. Giving up hurts more.
The strong should aid and protect the weak. Then, the weak will become strong, and they in turn will aid and protect those weaker than them. That is the law of nature.
